description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
   Enhancements 
   DIAGRAMNET-51349-Add support of converting a drawing to image same the area as PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51352-Accessing embedded files
     
    Bugs 
   DIAGRAMNET-51085-The formulas are lost under the controls tab of Shapesheet on saving in VSDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51094-Preserve default settings under the control tab on placing a Trapezoid shape
   DIAGRAMNET-51355-VSDX to PDF - the text items are misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-51356-VSDX to HTML - the text items are misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-51357-Open and save routine of VSDX - missing date and edit date attributes of annotations
   DIAGRAMNET-51358-A null pointer error occurred on loading VSDX drawing
   DIAGRAMNET-51359-Error in element author list after loading a VSDX
   DIAGRAMNET-51361-VSDX to VDX - the incorrect text font of the shape   
   DIAGRAMNET-51363-Open and save routine of VSDX - Tabs section turns into a self-closed tag
   DIAGRAMNET-51365-VSD to PNG - incorrect layout of the shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-51367-VSD drawing import - an error in the element Master
   DIAGRAMNET-51368-VSD to PNG - an overflow error occurred
   DIAGRAMNET-51369-VSD to PDF - misplaced text items at the bottom
   DIAGRAMNET-51371-VSDX to VSDX - additional text items are added
   DIAGRAMNET-51373-Open and save routine of a VSDX drawing is missing an Asian text font
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
